solution_line_template: After going on vacation, Grandpa has {times_multiplier} * {initial_tomatoes_count} = <<{times_multiplier}*{initial_tomatoes_count}={total_tomatoes_after_vacation}>>{total_tomatoes_after_vacation} tomatoes.

So in his absence, {total_tomatoes_after_vacation} - {initial_tomatoes_count} = <<{total_tomatoes_after_vacation}-{initial_tomatoes_count}={tomatoes_grown_in_absence}>>{tomatoes_grown_in_absence} tomatoes have grown.
